name: Sam's Misadventure with a demon: Origins
name_original: Sam's Misadventure with a demon: Origins
description:
ALERT!:

I have not tested out the game, I ran out of time so unfortunately I didn't Check for bugs...I apologize I'm advance and let me know what you've encountered 

Controls:

Move: WASD or Arrow keys

Shoot: aim with mouse cursor and left click to shoot 

Unfortunately i ran out of time / was a very busy week for me, so i cut out so much content, I hope you enjoy what is available as of now, and if demand is high, I'll continue this game.

"Music by DavidKBD"
